long_description: The REI RFID Hidden Travel wallet keeps important travel documents, credit cards and ID close at hand and combats potential ID theft by blocking access to personal data stored on embedded micro chips. Multiple pockets and compartments hold ID, credit cards, currency and travel documents; attaches to your belt via webbing loops and hides in your pant's pocket. Special liner helps block unauthorized scanning of RFID (radio frequency identification) chips inside passports and credit and debit cards. Water-resistant, ripstop nylon stands up to wear and tear.
short_description: The REI RFID Hidden Travel wallet keeps important travel documents, credit cards and ID close at hand and combats potential ID theft by blocking access to personal data stored on embedded micro chips.
